sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"组成，成分，部分"之意。
means: component ： 指一个整体的组成部分。
constituent ： 常可与component换用，指某一整体不可少的部分或成分。
element ： 指一个整体必不可少或固有的部分，强调一个复杂整体中最基本、最简单的元件、元素或成分等。
ingredient ： 普通用词，含义笼统。既可指混在一起而本身没有变化的物质，如配料，又可指与别的物质混在一起，发生了变化的成分。

sentence.Network_en: The active ingredient in some of the mouthwashes was simply detergent.
sentence.Network_cn: 某些漱口剂中的有效成分只不过是洗涤剂而已。

sentence.Network_en: Speed is the essential ingredient of all athletics.
sentence.Network_cn: 速度是所有田径运动项目的关键要素。

sentence.Network_en: Coconut is a basic ingredient for many curries.
sentence.Network_cn: 椰子是多种咖喱菜的基本成分。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin ingredient- 'entering', from the verb ingredi, from in- 'into' + gradi 'walk'

entry.def: Ingredients are the things that are used to make something, especially all the different foods you use when you are cooking a particular dish.
An ingredient of a situation is one of the essential parts of it.

example.ex: The meeting had all the ingredients of high political drama...
example.tran: 这次会议具备了作为高度戏剧性的政治事件的一切要素。

example.ex: I think that is one of the major ingredients in his success.
example.tran: 我认为那是他成功的主要因素之一。

means.word_mean: 1. a component of a mixture or compound

sentences.sentence: "jealousy was a component of his character"
"two constituents of a musical composition are melody and harmony"
"humor: an effective ingredient of a speech"

means.word_mean: 3. food that is a component of a mixture in cooking;

sentences.sentence: "the recipe lists all the fixings for a salad"

Sentence.sentence: Some restaurants are modifying the recipes (菜谱) of British dishes to breathe new life into the classics, while others are using better quality ingredients but remaining true to British traditions and tastes.
Matthew Hill, senior manager at the two-year-old SoHo restaurant Yorkshire Pudding, also uses better ingredients as a means of improving dishes

But rarely, if ever, do they publicly take the argument a step further, asserting that a growing manufacturing sector encourages craftsmanship and that craftsmanship is, if not a birthright, then a vital ingredient of the American self-image as a can-do, inventive, we-can-make-anything people.

means.word_mean: (混合物的)组成部分；（烹调的)原料

sentences.en: Imagination and hard work are the ingredients of success.
sentences.cn: 想像力和勤劳是成功的要素。

sentences.en: What are the ingredients of the cake?
sentences.cn: 这蛋糕是用哪些原料做成的?

jushi.english: Flour and fat are the most important ingredients.
jushi.chinese: 面粉和油脂是最重要的配料。

jushi.english: Imagination and hard work are the ingredients of success.
jushi.chinese: 想象力和勤劳是成功的要素。
